messageBody:
Robert Watkins wrote:
>
> You're _still_ thinking like a programmer... :)
>

Beg to differ. You are thinking like a programmer and I was just not
thinking ;-)

> and:
> public InvalidDataException extends Exception {
> public InvalidDataException(String messageKey, Object ... params) {
> super(Messages.format(messageKey, params);
> }
> }
>

That's what I did at my last job.

Actually it was more like :

public InvalidDataException extends LocalizedException {
public InvalidDataException(String messageKey, Object ... params) {
super(messageKey, params);
}
}

I haven't been able to do it at my current job because my colleagues
believe that exception messages should not be shown to users :-)

Kevin
